data.name: S.K.I.L.L. - Special Force 2 - SKILL <3 YOU
data.detailed_description:
S.K.I.L.L. – Special Force 2 – SKILL <3 YOU


Get your free SKILL <3 YOU DLC, packed full with rosy-cheeked love and deadly firepower! It contains:

SCORPION Heart – 30 days
Concieved to be compact and with minimal recoil, this small calibre submachine gun is prized by special forces in the Eastern European military and terrorists alike. With the Heart camo, it also has a wonderful ‘Awwww’ factor too.

Infinity Heart – 30 days
With its long barrel, this 9mm weapon has plenty of pow. The Heart camo makes it perfect for a loving hail of bullets.

PP2000 Heart – 30 days
As light as a standard pistol, yet with increased destructive power thanks to the kinetic energy penetrator magazine of the 7N31. The Heart camo also ensures some piercing love.

Dragunov SVD Heart – 30 days
The Dragunov sniper rifle with Heart camo lets you strike through the hearts of your enemies from a distance.

AUG A3 Heart – 30 days
High performance, dependable and, thanks to its excellent mobility, ideal for close quarters combat. With this in hand you can stun your enemies up close with your Heart camo before you then take them out, and not for dinner.

SIG551 Heart – 30 days
Accurate and as dependable as clockwork, this assault rifle is the joy of the Swiss army and is also popular with US special forces. The equipped Heart camo only increases its appeal immeasurably.

Bow Heart – 30 days
This bow can definitely hold its own with a pistol in terms of penetrative force, though don’t confuse it in the Heart camo for Cupid’s Bow!

M67 Heart – 30 days
This frag grenade flies through the air towards your enemies with a trail of colourful hearts. Not any less deadly, just extremely lovely <3

CAMO Heart – 30 days
Let love sing and colour your weapon with pink hearts.

CAMO Valentine Choco Praline – 30 days
Life may be like a box of chocolates, but with this spray, you know what you are going to get: tempting pralines all over your weapon.

CAMO Valentine Choco – 30 days
Transform your weapon into chocolate temptation with this spray.

How do I unlock my DLC in the game?

After purchase of a DLC pack, you will be presented with a Steam product key. Log in to S.K.I.L.L., head to the shop and go to 'Top up Cash'. This will open a window with a button labelled 'Gameforge Coupon'. Click this and follow the directions to redeem your Steam product key. The contents of the DLC pack will then appear in your inventory in the 'Gifts' section.

Important:
You can only purchase this DLC once per account.

data.short_description: Get your free SKILL <3 YOU DLC, packed full with rosy-cheeked love and deadly firepower!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Romanian*, Russian*, Swedish*, Turkish*, Czech*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: P4 3,0 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 6600 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7
  • Processor: Core2 Duo E6600 or comparable
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 8600 GT or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
